Name: RELA activation
Notes1: RELA can be self-sustaining or activated by the IKK complex when the NF-κB complex is not formed.

Name: NFKB1 expression
Notes1: NFKB1 expression is induced by RELA. The activation of RELA by IKK has been supported by immunohistochemistry evidence.

Name: NF-κB complex formation
Notes1: The NF-κB complex forms when both RELA and NFKB1 are present. The complex formation is supported by crystal structure evidence.

Name: IKK input
Notes1: The IKK complex is considered an external or constant input in this model.

Name: IL6 expression
Notes1: IL6 expression is induced by the active NF-κB complex, which serves as an inflammatory cytokine.
